Config.Name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
Config.Description: This variable is mandatory and specifies the password that will be set for the MariaDB root superuser account.

Config.Name: MYSQL_DATABASE
Config.Description: This variable is optional and allows you to specify the name of a database to be created on image startup.

Config.Name: MYSQL_USER
Config.Description: These variables are optional, used in conjunction to create a new user and to set that users password. This user will be granted superuser permissions for the database specified by the MYSQL_DATABASE variable. Both variables are required for a user to be created.

Config.Name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
Config.Description: Set the Password for the MYSQL_USER

Config.Name: traefik.enable
Config.Description: Set to true to proxy this application.
